subject: Customs costs for Portugal?
description_text:
I would be interested in purchasing your Pro X pedals and the price is over $300. I saw that shipping is free above that price, but is there a possibility that I will incur customs fees? Thanks.

Enviado de Outlook para Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Mauro Arsénio,  Which country are you located in? And which model do you need—Pro X Ultra? I’ll check whether our U.S. warehouse has it in stock. If it is available, we can ship it domestically within the U.S., which means no customs duties will be required.
